name: Roll With The Flow
description:
A simple, competitive, local 1v1 board game where you roll your dice and you move around a board. However, this comes with some extra twists!

  1. Multiple different win scenarios! Will you achieve victory by becoming rich? Or maybe becoming the fastest thing alive? Or how about attacking and destroying your enemies? Your choice!
  2. Build your own dice to play how you want! Build the most optimal dice to pave the way for victory! Or I guess you could just make your dice all 1's. That'd be funny. 

Controls:
Space - Roll Dice

How to Win:
1. Opponent's health is 0
2. You have 50+ coins
3. You passed your home 20 times first

Thanks for taking a look and I hope you enjoy! Please let me know of any suggestions/comments you have. Have fun!
